q1: What is Real Madrid going to do without Cristiano Ronaldo?
a1: Probably going to lose a lot more.
a2: My favorite is Modric. He's one of the world's best, almost as good as Ronaldo.
q3: How will Real Madrid do after he retires?
a3: It is a club, besides, it is the biggest in the world. I do not think he retires
a4: He will be missed but it is a team sport so I am sure they will do just fine.
